text: Avdotyino () is a rural locality (a village) in Malyginskoye Rural Settlement, Kovrovsky District, Vladimir Oblast, Russia. The population was 62 as of 2010. == Geography == The village is located 10 km north from Ruchey and 14 km north-west from Kolchugino. == References == Category:Rural localities in Kovrovsky District
title: Avdotyino, Kovrovsky District, Vladimir Oblast
